title: BRIEF-Tilly's Inc Q4 Sales $164.3 Million
text: March 12, 2018 / 8:21 PM / Updated 13 minutes ago BRIEF-Tilly's Inc Q4 Sales $164.3 Million Reuters Staff March 12 (Reuters) - Tillys Inc: * TILLY’S, INC. ANNOUNCES FISCAL 2017 FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR RESULTS * Q4 SALES $164.3 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $166.1 MILLION * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.23 INCLUDING ITEMS * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.25 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * ‍4TH QUARTER EPS OF $0.23, INCLUDING TAX REFORM CHARGE OF $0.01​ * ‍EXPECTS ITS Q1 COMPARABLE STORE SALES TO RANGE FROM FLAT TO A LOW SINGLE-DIGIT PERCENTAGE INCREASE​ * ‍EXPECTS Q1 PER SHARE RESULTS TO RANGE FROM A LOSS OF $0.01 TO INCOME PER DILUTED SHARE OF $0.03​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
